original_title: Billie Eilish: "The World’s A Little Blurry" Live Premiere Event
overview: The Live Premiere Event for "Billie Eilish: The World’s A Little Blurry", Includes an exclusive,  intimate performance and conversation with Eilish, discussion with director R.J. Cutler and other special surprises
title: Billie Eilish: "The World’s A Little Blurry" Live Premiere Event
